meta.name: English
meta.title: IAFEI - International Association of Financial Executives Institutes

about.title: About IAFEI
about.description: The International Association of Financial Executives Institutes (IAFEI) brings together national professional organizations of financial executives from around the world.
about.founded: Founded in 1969, IAFEI serves as a global platform for professional development, networking, and knowledge sharing among financial executives worldwide.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To advance the profession of financial management worldwide through education, certification, and professional development programs that enhance the skills and knowledge of financial executives globally.

members.title: Global Network
members.description: IAFEI represents professional organizations from major economies including the United States, Japan, China, Germany, and many other countries, creating a truly international network of financial professionals.

footer.copyright: Â© 2025 International Association of Financial Executives Institutes. All rights reserved.

about.title: About IAFEI
about.description: IAFEI represents the collective voice of financial executives worldwide.

members.title: Member Organizations
members.description: IAFEI brings together leading financial executive organizations from around the world.
